overview:
## Discussion

This property represents the main content of a section. The view your style creates needs to provide a control to subscribe to each option in the array.

Use the properties of each [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option] value to declare your control style, and use the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option/subscribe()] method in response to a subscribe interaction.

# options

**Instance Property**

The subscription options to merchandise within a section.

## Declaration

```swift
var options: [SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration.Option]
```

## Discussion

This property represents the main content of a section. The view your style creates needs to provide a control to subscribe to each option in the array.

Use the properties of each [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option] value to declare your control style, and use the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option/subscribe()] method in response to a subscribe interaction.
title: options
